articles.author: Adam Rogers
articles.title: Why the sky changing colors may save us from climate change apocalypse
articles.description: Climate change is turning the sky green. And orange. And brown. But thanks to a quirk of evolution, the cataclysmic light show may be what saves us.
articles.content:
The sky is supposed to be blue, dammit. I mean, come on. And if it isn't? That's a signal.
Earlier this month, a monster Midwestern thunderstorm called a derecho 60 miles wide, with gusts up to 90 m… [+7341 chars]
